item.title: Siri Touch Typing Easter Egg in macOS
item.description: If you type the home row keys of the QWERTY layout into macOS’ Spotlight Search twice, Siri understands that you are touch typing. Steps to reproduce Make sure you’re connected to the Internet. Type asdfjkl;asdfjkl; into Spotlight Search.
